report.title: Kappa Opioid Activity? Similarity to Enadoline
report.author: 37H4N
report.bodytext: This is not a personal report, but an interesting observation I made. /n /n In your recent announcement about Salvinorin A's Kappa Opioid activity (/n) you linked to a paper by Walsh which investigated the pharmacodynamic effects of Enadoline, a selective kappa opioid agonist (like Salvinorin A). [/n] /n /n Only two of the nine test subjects received doses high enough to be labelled psychotomimetic. One of the reports of this dosing, for a 'Participant no. 6' reads very much like my personal experiences, and published reports, of Salvia: /n /n /n This is all very fascinating. I hope to hear more about Salvinorin A research in the near future! /n /n -e
